AI Description: FragGeneScan is a gene-finding program specifically designed for short reads from next-generation sequencing (NGS) technology. It predicts protein-coding sequences in short DNA sequences such as metagenomic and single-cell sequencing data.
Core Features: 2. Designed for short reads from NGS technology
3. Particularly useful for metagenomic and single-cell sequencing data
4. Supports both metagenomic and whole genome sequencing data
